abstract: Options traders are boosting wagers that BHP Billiton and potential rivals will bid higher than the $40 billion already offered by the world’s biggest mining company for Potash Corp. of Saskatchewan Inc., Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Options traders are boosting wagers that BHP Billiton and potential rivals will bid higher than the $40 billion already offered by the world’s biggest mining company for Potash Corp. of Saskatchewan Inc., Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Options traders are increasing their wagers that BHP Billiton and potential rivals will bid higher than the $39 billion already offered for the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Options Traders Betting Potash Bid Will Rise

abstract: The Saskatchewan government said Monday that if the federal government approves BHP Billiton’s foreign takeover of Potash they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”
snippet: The Saskatchewan government said Monday that if the federal government approves BHP Billiton’s foreign takeover of Potash they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”
lead_paragraph: The Saskatchewan government has said that if the Canadian government approves BHP Billiton‘s foreign takeover of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan they will consider it a “profound betrayal of our province and its people.”

headline.main: Saskatchewan Says Approving Potash Deal Would Be a ‘Betrayal’
